basic.description: Experiments in heat, optics, electron physics, quantum physics, and radioactivity are performed. A substantial part of the course is an experimental project during the Winter Term. A topic for the experimental physics, or observational astronomy project will be assigned after discussion with the student.
basic.subject: PHYS
basic.title: General Laboratory

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites     PHYS239 and PHYS242 and PHYS250
